name: @jbs/vue3-formulate
description: A form of Vue Formulate for Vue 3 support and vite

scripts.build:
vite build & npm run build:css & wait && echo "Build complete:
esm: $(gzip -c dist/formulate.esm.js | wc -c)b gzip
umd: $(gzip -c dist/formulate.umd.js | wc -c)b gzip
min: $(gzip -c dist/formulate.min.js | wc -c)b gzip"
scripts.build:css: sass themes/snow/snow.scss ./dist/snow.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b '> 2%' ./dist/snow.css | postcss --no-map --use cssnano > ./dist/snow.min.css

author: Justin Schroeder <justin@wearebraid.com>, Vue 3 Fork: Ryan Mann <rmann@jbssolutions.com>
